peachbox.fs package¶

Submodules¶

peachbox.fs.fs module¶

class peachbox.fs.fs.Fs[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class of the file system.

dir_utime(path)[source]¶

Unix time of a directory. Directory name must be an integer.

dirs_of_period(mart, path, from_utime, before_utime)[source]¶

Lists directories of a given time period.

ls(mart, path='')[source]¶
ls_d(mart, path='')[source]¶
test_path_exists()[source]¶

peachbox.fs.local module¶

class peachbox.fs.local.Local[source]¶

Bases: peachbox.fs.fs.Fs

Interface to the local filesystem. Filesystem operations work on <self.dwh_path>/<mart>/.

ls(mart, path)[source]¶
ls_a(path)[source]¶

peachbox.fs.s3 module¶

class peachbox.fs.s3.S3[source]¶

Bases: peachbox.fs.fs.Fs

Interface to Amazon S3. Operations work on s3n://<mart>/, where <mart> is a bucket on S3.

connection()[source]¶
